How to install my app
=======================
System Requirements:
	- Python 3.7
	- Flask 1.1.1
	- SQLAlchemy 1.3.13
-----------------------
Steps to run the app:

1. Clone our respository to your desired location

git clone https://github.com/cmpe131-spring2020/Team7.git


2. Enter the Project file location where you cloned the repository
cd Team7

3. Run the app 
python3 run.py
